00062     function enableConsole( CView $oView  )
00063     {
00064         //  Define javascript array
00065         $_sScript = "\nvar " . self::JS_NAME . " = new Array();";
00066         $_sScript .= "\n" . self::JS_NAME . "[ 'Version' ] = '" . Yii::getVersion() . "';";
00067 
00068         //  Comment out the ones you don't need.
00069         //  The first 4 or 5 are suggested mostly.
00070         //  The others are general info that doesn't change much, but
00071         //  Might be good for familarization with the way Yii works.
00072 
00073         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getSessionData();
00074         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getPageData();
00075         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getVars( $oView );
00076         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getLogs();
00077         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getConstants();
00078         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getModels();
00079         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getControllers();
00080         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getPhp();
00081         $_sScript .= "\n" . $this->getModules();
00082 
00083         $_sScript .= " \nconsole.dir( " . self::JS_NAME . " );\n";
00084         
00085         //  Now echo it out and call the Firebug console.
00086         Yii::app()->getClientScript()->registerScript( self::JS_NAME, $_sScript, CClientScript::POS_READY );
00087     }

00096     protected function getVars( $oView )
00097     {
00098         //  Controller variables
00099         $_arData = array( 'action' => $oView->getAction()->getId(), 'id' => $oView->getId(), 'layout' => $oView->layout, 'uniqueId' => $oView->getUniqueId(), 'viewPath' => $oView->getViewPath(), 'pageTitle' => $oView->pageTitle ); 
00100         
00101         //  Parameters
00102         $_arParams = Yii::app()->getParams();
00103         if ( is_array( $_arParams ) ) $_arData = array_merge( $_arData, $_arParams );
00104 
00105         return self::JS_NAME . "[ 'Variables' ] = " . CJSON::encode( $_arData ) . ";";
00106     }
00107 
00111     protected function getLogs()
00112     {
00113         //  Flatten log entries...
00114         foreach ( Yii::getLogger()->getLogs() as $_oLog )
00115             $_arLogData[] = implode( ', ', $_oLog );
00116         
00117         return self::JS_NAME . "[ 'Application Log' ] = " . CJSON::encode( $_arLogData ) . ";";
00118     }
00119     
00123     protected function getConstants()
00124     {
00125         $_arData = get_defined_constants( true );
00126         $_arData = $_arData[ 'user' ];
00127         return self::JS_NAME . "[ 'Constants' ] = " . json_encode( $_arData ) . ";";
00128     }

00141     protected function getPageData()
00142     {
00143         $_arData = array();
00144         
00145         if ( is_array( $_REQUEST ) ) $_arData = array_merge( $_arData, $_REQUEST );
00146         
00147         if ( ! empty( $_arData ) ) 
00148             return self::JS_NAME . "[ '\$_REQUEST Data' ] = " . CJSON::encode( $_arData ) . ";";
00149 
00150         return self::JS_NAME . "[ '$_REQUEST' ] = 'No Data Submitted';";
00151     }

00156     function getPhp() 
00157     {
00158         $_arTemp = array();
00159         $_arTemp['VERSION'] = phpversion();
00160         $_arTemp['REQUEST_URI'] = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
00161         $_arTemp['SERVER_PORT'] = $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
00162         $_arTemp['SCRIPT_FILENAME'] = $_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME'];
00163         $_arTemp['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] = $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'];
00164 
00165         return self::JS_NAME . "['PHP Info'] = " . CJSON::encode( $_arTemp ) . ";";
00166     }

00171     function getModules() 
00172     {
00173         if ( function_exists( 'apache_get_modules' ) ) return self::JS_NAME . "['Apache Modules'] = " . CJSON::encode( apache_get_modules() ) . ";";
00174     }

00179     function getControllers() 
00180     {
00181         $_arTemp = array();
00182 
00183         $_sCPath = Yii::app()->getControllerPath();
00184         $_arPaths = scandir( $_sCPath );
00185         
00186         foreach ( $_arPaths as $_sPath )
00187         {
00188             if ( is_file( $_sCPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sPath ) && preg_match( "/^(.+)Controller\.php$/", basename( $_sPath ), $m ) )
00189             {
00190                 $_sControllerName = str_ireplace( 'Controller.php', '', $_sPath );
00191                 $_sClassName = $_sControllerName . 'Controller';
00192                 Yii::import( 'application.controllers.' . $_sClassName );
00193                 $_sControllerName{0} = strtolower( $_sControllerName{0} );
00194                 $_oObj = new $_sClassName( $_sControllerName );
00195                 $_arData = $this->getClassDiffValues( get_class_vars( 'CController' ), get_object_vars( $_oObj ) );
00196                 $_arData[ 'Defined Views' ] = $this->getViewList( $_oObj );
00197 
00198                 $_arTemp[ $_sControllerName ] = $_arData;
00199             }
00200         }
00201 
00202         return self::JS_NAME . "[ 'Controllers' ] = ".CJSON::encode( $_arTemp ).";";
00203     }

00208     function getModels() 
00209     {
00210         $_arTemp = array();
00211 
00212         $_sCPath = Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'application.models' );
00213         $_arPaths = scandir( $_sCPath );
00214         
00215         foreach ( $_arPaths as $_sPath )
00216         {
00217             if ( is_file( $_sCPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sPath ) && preg_match( "/^(.+)\.php$/", basename( $_sPath ), $m  ) )
00218             {
00219                 $_sClassName = $_sModelName = str_ireplace( '.php', '', $_sPath );
00220                 Yii::import( 'application.models.' . $_sClassName );
00221                 $_oObj = new $_sClassName( $_sModelName );
00222                 $_arData = $this->getClassDiffValues( get_class_vars( 'CModel' ), get_object_vars( $_oObj ) );
00223                 $_arData[ 'Table Name' ] = ( method_exists( $_oObj, 'tableName' ) ) ? $_oObj->tableName() : $_sModelName;
00224                 $_arTemp[ $_sModelName ] = $_arData;
00225             }
00226         }
00227 
00228         return self::JS_NAME . "[ 'Models' ] = ".CJSON::encode( $_arTemp ).";";
00229     }

00238     function getClassDiffValues( &$arBaseVars, &$arClassVars )
00239     {
00240         $_arTemp = array();
00241 
00242         foreach ( $arClassVars as $_sName => $_oVar )
00243         {
00244             if ( @$arBaseVars[ $_sName ] !== $arClassVars[ $_sName ] )
00245                 $_arTemp[ $_sName ] = ( is_array( $_oVar ) ) ? implode( ', ', $_oVar ) : $_oVar;
00246         }
00247 
00248         return $_arTemp;
00249     }
00250 
00256     protected function getViewList( $oCtrl )
00257     {
00258         $_arTemp = array();
00259         $_sPath = $oCtrl->getViewPath();
00260         
00261         try
00262         {
00263             if ( is_dir( $_sPath ) )
00264             {
00265                 foreach ( scandir( $_sPath ) as $_sFile )
00266                 {
00267                     if ( is_file( $_sPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sFile ) && preg_match("/(.php|.html)$/", $_sFile ) ) 
00268                         $_arTemp[] = $_sFile;
00269                 }
00270             }
00271         }
00272         catch ( Exception $_ex ) {}
00273         
00274         return $_arTemp;
00275     }
